name: inactive medium hammer walker - steel
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a medium clamp and a jackhammer. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the medium wheels easily roll over most surfaces.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.
